name: trello-add-attachment-to-card
description: Adds a file attachment on a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-attachments-post)

cardId.description: The ID of the Card to add the Attachment to

file.description: Provide either a file URL or a path to a file in the /tmp directory (for example, /tmp/myFile.pdf).

setCover.description: Determines whether to use the new attachment as a cover for the Card

name: trello-add-checklist
description: Adds a new checklist to a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-checklists-post).

name: trello-add-comment
description: Create a new comment on a specific card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-actions-comments-post).

name: trello-add-existing-label-to-card
description: Adds an existing label to the specified card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-idlabels-post).

cardId.description: The ID of the Card to add the Label to

name: trello-add-member-to-card
description: Adds a member to the specified card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-idmembers-post).

cardId.description: The ID of the Card to add the Member to

name: trello-archive-card
description: Archives a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-put).

cardId.description: The ID of the Card to archive

name: trello-complete-checklist-item
description: Completes an existing checklist item in a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-checkitem-idcheckitem-put).

name: trello-create-board
description: Create a new Trello board or copy from an existing one. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-boards/#api-boards-post).

name.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

defaultLabels.description: Determines whether to use the default set of labels.

defaultLists.description: Determines whether to add the default set of lists to a board (To Do, Doing, Done). It is ignored if idBoardSource is provided.

desc.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

idOrganization.description: The id or name of the team the board should belong to.

idBoardSource.description: The id of a board to copy into the new board.

keepFromSource.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value `cards`.

powerUps.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board. One of: `all`, `calendar`, `cardAging`, `recap`, `voting`.

prefsPermissionLevel.description: The permissions level of the board. One of: org, private, public.

prefsVoting.description: Who can vote on this board. One of disabled, members, observers, org, public.

prefsComments.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: disabled, members, observers, org, public.

prefsInvitations.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join. One of: admins, members.

prefsSelfJoin.description: Determines whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited.

prefsCardCovers.description: Determines whether card covers are enabled.

prefsBackground.description: The id of a custom background or one of: `blue`, `orange`, `green`, `red`, `purple`, `pink`, `lime`, `sky`, `grey`.

prefsCardAging.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled. One of: pirate, regular.

name: trello-create-card
description: Creates a new card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-post).

pos.description: The position of the new card. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive float

idList.description: The ID of the list the card should be created in.

idMembers.description: Array of member IDs to add to the card

idLabels.description: Array of labelIDs to add to the card

file.description: Provide either a file URL or a path to a file in the /tmp directory (for example, /tmp/myFile.pdf).

idCardSource.description: Specify an existing card to copy contents from. Keep in mind that if you copy a card, the **File Attachment Path**, **File Attachment URL** and **File Attachment Type** fields will be ignored.

keepFromSource.description: Specify which properties to copy from the source card

name: trello-create-checklist-item
description: Creates a new checklist item in a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-checklists/#api-checklists-id-checkitems-post).

card.description: The ID of the Card that the checklist item should be added to

name.description: The name of the new check item on the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

checked.description: Determines whether the check item is already checked when created.

due.description: A due date for the checkitem. **Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ**

dueReminder.description: A dueReminder for the due date on the checkitem

idMember.description: An ID of a member resource

name: trello-create-label
description: Creates a new label on the specified board. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-labels/#api-labels-post).

idBoard.description: The ID of the board to create the label on.

color.description: The color for the label. One of: yellow, purple, blue, red, green, orange, black, sky, pink, lime, null (null means no color, and the label will not show on the front of cards)

name: trello-create-list
description: Creates a new list. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-lists/#api-lists-post).

idBoard.description: The long ID of the board the list should be created on.

idListSource.description: ID of the list to copy into the new list.

pos.description: Position of the list. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive floating point number

name: trello-delete-checklist
description: Deletes the specified checklist. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-checklists/#api-checklists-id-delete).

carId.description: The ID of the card containing the checklist do delete

checklistId.description: The ID of the checklist to delete

name: trello-get-cards-in-list
description: List the cards in a list. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-lists/#api-lists-id-cards-get).

board.description: The ID of the board containing the list

listId.description: The ID of the list to get cards from

name: trello-get-cards-on-board
description: Get all of the open Cards on a Board. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-boards/#api-boards-id-cards-get).

boardId.description: The ID of the board to get cards from

name: trello-get-list
description: Get information about a List. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-lists/#api-lists-id-get).

listId.description: The ID of the Trello list

name: trello-remove-label-from-card
description: Removes label from card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-idlabels-idlabel-delete).

cardId.description: The ID of the Card to remove the Label from

labelId.description: The ID of the Label to be removed from the card.

name: trello-search-boards
description: Searches for boards matching the specified query. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-search/#api-search-get).

idOrganizations.description: Specify the organizations to search for boards in

boardsLimit.description: The maximum number of boards to return.

name: trello-search-cards
description: Searches for cards matching the specified query. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-search/#api-search-get).

idBoards.description: The IDs of boards to search for cards in

cardsLimit.description: The maximum number of cards to return.

name: trello-search-checklists
description: Find a checklist on a particular board or card by name. [See the documentation here](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-boards/#api-boards-id-checklists-get) and [here](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-checklists-get).

type.description: Whether to search boards or cards for the checklist.

checkItems.description: Whether to display checklist items in the result. Select `all` or `none`.

checkItemFields.description: Fields to include in the results. `all` or a list of: `name`, `nameData`, `pos`, `state`, `type`

fields.description: Fields to include in the results. `all` or a list of: `idBoard`, `idCard`, `name`, `pos`. Eg: `idBoard,idCard,name,pos`. Eg: `all`.

name: trello-search-members
description: Search for Trello members. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-search/#api-search-members-get).

idBoard.description: The ID of the board to search for members.

idOrganization.description: The ID of the organization to search for members.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Maximum of 20.

name: trello-update-card
description: Updates a card. [See the documentation](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/rest/api-group-cards/#api-cards-id-put).

name.description: The new name for the card.

desc.description: The new description for the card.

idMembers.description: Change the members that are assigned to the card

idList.description: Move the card to a particular list

idLabels.description: Array of labelIDs to add to the card

pos.description: The position of the new card. `top`, `bottom`, or a positive float

dueComplete.description: Whether the due date should be marked complete.

subscribed.description: Whether the member should be subscribed to the card.
